entities.name: quirrell
entities.description: Quirrell is introduced as the one who gasped Harry. He is described as smiling and having a calm tone.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as reacting to Quirrell's revelation. He is described as being shocked and unable to take it in.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned by Quirrell as someone who seems like the type to be useful for his mission. He is also described as muttering a counter-curse to save Harry.

relationships.description: Quirrell reveals that he was the one who tried to kill Harry, not Snape. He explains how Miss Granger's actions broke his eye contact with Harry.
Quirrell describes Snape as someone he works with, who helps him in his mission by muttering a counter-curse to save Harry.
